meanings.sent1: The hugeous elephant towered over the trees.
meanings.sent2: The hugeous mountain could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The hugeous cake at the party was so big, it took up the entire table!
meanings.sent4: The hugeous wave crashed against the shore with immense power.
meanings.sent5: The hugeous spaceship filled the entire hangar, leaving little room for anything else.

meanings.definition: Very ugly or monstrous in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The hugeous monster in the movie scared all the children.
meanings.sent2: The hugeous spider in the corner made everyone scream.
meanings.sent3: The hugeous painting in the museum was so ugly, it made people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The hugeous tree in the forest looked like a twisted, gnarled creature.
meanings.sent5: The hugeous mask at the costume party was so frightening, no one could recognize the person wearing it.
